name: The Last Vestige
description:
RECOMMENDED  TO DOWNLOAD as game may lag on browser

Play a strategy based tower defense game. Your task is to defend the Core, the last vestige of humanity. In it is all of the world’s diversity. You will be fighting off hordes of angry minions in an effort to keep the Core alive. They will be swarming in from all directions, keeping you on your toes. Defend your home. Keep it alive!

CONTROLS

Click on turret to select it

When turret is selected, click on a black tile to place it

When a turret it selected, press 'Escape' to exit 'Shop' mode
